name: Gimmick! Yumetaro Odyssey
overview: After rescuing her owner from the hands of the jealous toys, Yumetaro happily returned to her home, but his peace will not last too much. The last of the "toys", the most modern and sophisticated microcomputer of that time, also envied the love that the girl felt for Yumetaro, and in a fit of anger absorbed our hero and drove him to a totally unknown digital world where a long odyssey to return to her friend begins. Are you going to help this nice creature?
